2050920.name: Scranny
2050920.description:
It's your first day as a PIZZA delivery boy and you get to deliver your first PIZZA at Scranny's house but when you arrive at the House they lock you up in a Prison Cell to later use you to achieve ultimate powers

Use every item you can find in the Scranny's house that can help you escape the house (keys, gas, Crowbar), There are three different types of escapes -
Main Gate Escape
Car Escape
Potion Escape

Every time they catch you trying to escape the house they put you back in your prison cell until the Full Moon night when they can finally use you to get ultimate powers, Try your best to escape before the fifth night.

Best Of Luck Escaping !!
2050920.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
